info.para: Strada Imaging Ltd (the "Company," "we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we collect from users of our web app, how we use that information, and with whom we share it. This Privacy Policy applies to our web app that takes video and GPS files as input and uses artificial intelligence (AI) to perform analysis on it (the "Service").
By using the Service, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, you should not use the Service.

info.title: Information We Collect
info.para: When you use the Service, we may collect the following types of information:

data: Video files: We collect video files uploaded by the user to analyze using AI.
GPS files: We collect GPS files uploaded by the user to analyze using AI.
Usage data: We may collect information about your use of the Service, such as the amount of time spent on the Service, the features used, and the frequency of use.
Log data: We may collect log data, which may include information such as your IP address, browser type, the referring domain, pages visited, and search terms.

info.title: Use of Information
info.para: We use the information we collect to:

data: Analyze video and GPS data: We use AI to analyze the video and GPS files uploaded by the user.
Improve the Service: We use usage and log data to improve the Service and to troubleshoot technical issues.
Communicate with users: We may use your contact information to communicate with you about the Service or to respond to your inquiries.
Enforce our policies: We may use the information we collect to enforce our policies and terms of service.

info.title: Disclosure of Information
info.para: We may share the information we collect with the following parties:

data: Service providers: We may share information with third-party service providers who help us operate and maintain the Service.
Legal requirements: We may disclose information in response to a subpoena, court order, or other legal process.
Safety concerns: We may disclose information to protect the safety and security of our users, employees, or property.
Business transfers: We may transfer information in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets.

info.title: Security
info.para: We take reasonable measures to protect the information we collect from unauthorized access, use, and disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

info.title: Children's Privacy
info.para: The Service is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will promptly delete that information.

info.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
info.para: We may modify this Privacy Policy at any time, and any modifications will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the Service after any modification to this Privacy Policy constitutes your acceptance of the modification.

info.title: Contact Us
info.para: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us.
